sentences.english: Please click here for past issues of "e-Newsletter".
sentences.chinese: 查閱前期《電子快訊》請按此。

sentences.english: If you want to unsubscribe our Daily News, please click here .
sentences.chinese: 如不希望再收取時富證券研究部快訊，請按此處。

sentences.english: TVXQ the first quick news to be able to present in here.
sentences.chinese: 神起第一手快訊會在這裏呈現。

sentences.english: Stock Alerts Plus Screener, Ratings, Options.
sentences.chinese: 股票快訊另外篩分，分級，選項。

sentences.english: The research is published in this week's edition of Science Express.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究成果將發表在本週出版的《科學快訊》上。

sentences.english: Use Google Alerts to keep your finger on the business news pulse.
sentences.chinese: 用谷歌快訊使你的指尖把握商業動脈。

sentences.english: Examples include personalized news, personalized search, alerts and recommendations to buy.
sentences.chinese: 示例包括個人新聞，個人搜索，快訊和推薦購買。

sentences.english: Everybody has a Google alert on their name.
sentences.chinese: 人人都有自己名字的谷歌快訊。

sentences.english: The editor eventually accepted a toned-down version of the correspondent's dispatch.
sentences.chinese: 主編最後接受了這位通訊員一篇措辭溫和的快訊。

definition: Nikkei Shimbun, Japanese equivalent of Financial Times
pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Jing1 ji4 Xin1 wen2

definition: Mainichi Shimbun, a Japanese daily newspaper

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

definition: golden years (after the age of about 60)
